gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Nets 125, Bulls 108
gameRecap.excerpt: Brooklyn drains 25 3PT FGs to defeat Chicago, 125-108. For Brooklyn, Cam Thomas led the way with 28 points (five 3PM), eight rebounds, and four assists while aided by Dennis Schroder (27 points (seven 3PM), five rebounds, seven assists) and Mikal Bridges (25 points (career-high tying seven 3PM), four steals) in the victory. DeMar DeRozan finished with 31 points and eight rebounds with Coby White adding 18 points (three 3PM) and nine assists for Chicago in the losing effort. Brooklyn improves to 29-45, while Chicago moves to 35-39 in the loss.
